text: If gates are opened in order G1->G2->G3 After G1 gate is opened, fishermen are placed at following spots. Distance = 11m G1 After G2 gate is opened, fishermen are placed at following spots. Distance = 5m G1 G2 After G3 gate is opened, fishermen are placed at following spots. Distance = 3m G1 G2 G3 Total distance in this order : 11 +5+3 =19
